thread.section_title: DriveTime Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of DriveTime | www.drivetime.com | 4 of 447
thread.title: Laura Clark

author: Laura Clark
title: Laura Clark
text: This is the first car lot that I have walked into . Where everyone is nice and they talk to u ask if u need anything like coffee popcorn water. They really make u feel at home. I really liked our salesman Scott .. We found the car I was looking for . Yes it was affordable. I am going to refer all the people I know to this place. Thank you so much. Laura clark
